revision.text: '''Kebia''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by planting [[Pamtre]] and equipping the [[Rocky Helmet]]. The Pamtre will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. This berry can be bought from the Johto [[Berry Master]] for 10,000 {{farmpoints}} if the player is running the "No Oak Item" [[Challenge Mode|challenge]], and has already unlocked the Pamtre berry. [[Farming Setups]] using Kebia can be found [[Farming Setups#Squirtbottle Leveling Strategies|here]]
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
